description: Manage data collection rule association for monitor control service.

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule association create
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule association create --association-name
                                                   --resource
                                                   [--data-collection-endpoint-id]
                                                   [--data-collection-rule-id]
                                                   [--description]
examples: az monitor data-collection rule association create --name "myAssociation" --rule-id "/subscriptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179- c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Insights/dataCollectionRules/myCollectionRule" --resource "subscriptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179- c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVm "

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule association delete
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule association delete --association-name
                                                   --resource
                                                   [--yes]
examples: az monitor data-collection rule association delete --name "myAssociation" --resource "subscr iptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179- c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVm "

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule association list
commands.summary: Lists associations for the specified data collection rule. And Lists associations for the specified data collection endpoint. And Lists associations for the specified resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule association list [--data-collection-endpoint-name]
                                                 [--data-collection-rule-name]
                                                 [--resource]
                                                 [--resource-group]
examples: az monitor data-collection rule association list --rule-name "myCollectionRule" --resource-group "myResourceGroup"
az monitor data-collection rule association list --data-collection-endpoint-name "myDataCollectionEndpointName" --resource-group "myResourceGroup"
az monitor data-collection rule association list --resource "subscriptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179-c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVm"

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule association list-by-resource
commands.summary: List associations for the specified resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule association list-by-resource --resource
                                                             [--max-items]
                                                             [--next-token]

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule association show
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule association show --association-name
                                                 --resource
examples: az monitor data-collection rule association show --name "myAssociation" --resource "subscrip tions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179- c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVm "

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule association update
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule association update --association-name
                                                   --resource
                                                   [--add]
                                                   [--data-collection-endpoint-id]
                                                   [--data-collection-rule-id]
                                                   [--description]
                                                   [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                   [--remove]
                                                   [--set]
examples: az monitor data-collection rule association update --name "myAssociation" --rule-id "/subscr iptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179- c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Insights/dataCollectionRules /myCollectionRule" --resource "subscriptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179- c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVm "
